advancedQueries.query:
sum(kubelet_running_pod_count{instance=~$node, agent_tag_cluster=~$cluster} or vector(0))  +
(sum(kubelet_running_pods{instance=~$node, agent_tag_cluster=~$cluster}) or vector(0))

sum(kubelet_running_containers{instance=~$node, agent_tag_cluster=~$cluster} or vector(0)) +
( sum(kubelet_running_container_count{instance=~$node, agent_tag_cluster=~$cluster}) or vector(0) )

sum(rate(kubelet_runtime_operations_errors_total{instance=~$node, agent_tag_cluster=~$cluster}[$__interval])) by (instance, operation_type, agent_tag_cluster) / sum(rate(kubelet_runtime_operations_total{instance=~$node ,agent_tag_cluster=~$cluster}[$__interval])) by (operation_type, instance, agent_tag_cluster)

sum(rate(storage_operation_errors_total{instance=~$node,  agent_tag_cluster=~$cluster}[$__interval])) by (instance, operation_name, volume_plugin, agent_tag_cluster) / sum(rate(storage_operation_status_count{instance=~$node,  agent_tag_cluster=~$cluster}[$__interval])) by (instance, operation_name, volume_plugin, agent_tag_cluster)

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(storage_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{instance=~$node, agent_tag_cluster=~$cluster}[$__interval])) by (instance, operation_name, volume_plugin, le, agent_tag_cluster))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rest_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{instance=~$node, agent_tag_cluster=~$cluster}[$__interval])) by (instance, agent_tag_cluster, verb, url, le))

panels.description: For more info, you can go to the 'Go internals' dashboard
panels.name: Goroutines
